Posts.Content: I totally agree with suzyxz we would all be very happy and doctors would be out of business.  Mets to the bone is a serious complication but a common one for breast cancer if left untreated it will spread up and down your spine and be very painful. If treated immmediately and ca responds you could consievably die from something else.  As long as they can treat you there is hope.
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer Mets to the Bones
